content: a copy of this pattern is available on the michaels website at the wayback machine 1 updated colors add a fresh look to this classic ripple crochet afghan pattern **skill level ** easy **gauge ** 1 pattern repeat = 5-1/2 in 8 row = 5 in skill level easy **materials ** red heart® super saver® art e300 8 ounce/452 yard solid and 6 ounce/348 yard multicolor skeins 21 ounces ca 8 ounces cb 12 ounces cc 9 ounces cd afghan 316 soft white ca 334 buff cb 382 country blue cc 303 painted desert print cd inset 1 316 soft white ca 661 frosty green cb 358 lavender cc 310 monet print cd inset 2 381 light blue ca 387 soft navy cb 311 white cc 385 royal cd 1 https //web archive org/web/20070802181251/http //www michaels com/art/online/projectsheet pid=24220
